name: Wouter Groeneveld
text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts! I’m also a MI nut, the series left a big impression on me as a teenager. The Special Editions that came out in the 2010s did already come with full voice acting, there’s a patch that extracts those sound files to use them in the original DOS VGA ones if you’re in that kind of thing (which of course I am).
